data.name: Hypnospace Outlaw (Original Soundtrack)
data.detailed_description:
The Hypnospace Outlaw Original Soundtrack features all the wonderfully nostalgic and quirky tracks that breathe life into Hypnospace's pages and revives the spirit of the '90s throughout the game.

From Chowder Man to Klyfka, the soundtrack includes a whole host of fake artists and music that bring back the feel of internets past and engenders new favourites across a range of genres.

Hypnospace OST Vol. 1 - Jay Tholen

1. Boot Sequence
2. New Era
3. Sleeptime Computing
4. Soundscape I: Temple
5. Chill it Right (Fre3zer)
6. Icy Girl (Fre3zer)
7. Colder Than the Rest (Fre3zer)
8. Formations (Basidia)
9. Ghost of the Grotto (Basidia)
10. Soundscape II: Secret Forest
11. Hypnospace 2.0
12. Millennium Anthem (2000 New Years Eve)
13. Soundscape III: Mystery, Soundscape IV: Virtual Shaman
14. Eulogy
15. Frontier

Hypnospace OST Vol. 2 - Jay Tholen

1. HypnOS 1.04
2. Earth Our Home
3. Global Groove
4. Global Newsroom
5. Wild Sleep
6. Tuba Buffet's Brass Shade
7. DM Hazebeat 001
8. Ice Cream and Booze
9. The Gizmo Factory
10. Dimensional Voyager
11. Slap It Up
12. Age of Creation
13. Relaxation
14. Cave Drip
15. Leather Jacket Man
16. Front Porch
17. Always Delicious
18. Our Heavenly Home
19. Forest Feast
20. Goodtime Rock
21. The Banjo Boy
22. A Child's Melody
23. Awesome Rap Beat
24. Waking Up
25. Teentopia Hypnospace Anthem
26. Pizza Dance
27. SquisherZ [AUD2HSM CONVERTER TRIAL]
28. Tuba Buffet's Night Out
29. X-MAZ MEDLEY (Coolpunk)
30. Gotta Gotta
31. Moonlit Sewer Garden
32. Fungal Jive
33. Drink Drink Drink It Right
34. Calculated Memories
35. Work Through Sunrise
36. In My Icy Palace
37. You're Promoted!
38. Twilight Meditation
39. The Suspense
40. Tension
41. We Fell into a Dream
42. Something Lurking
43. The Teknoshamanatrix
44. Leeches & The Festering Orifice
45. Impending Spook
46. Katie's Kuddly Kat Korner
47. Hypnospace is Great
48. Merchants of the Next Wave
49. Millennium Anthem (.hsm version)
50. Earmint
51. Battle Hymn of the Republic (W.E. Briggs We Salute you)
52. The Birthstones

data.short_description: The Hypnospace Outlaw Original Soundtrack features all the wonderfully nostalgic and quirky tracks that breathe life into Hypnospace's pages and revives the spirit of the '90s throughout the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics should be fine
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 Ivy Bridge
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel i5 Haswell
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 Ivy Bridge
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 Haswell
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
